item.title: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）在公布第四季度亏损和销售额下降后，于周二表示将在未来三年内关闭 150 家门店。
item.description:
Macy's will close 150 stores over the next three years, the department store said Tuesday, after posting a fourth quarter loss and declining sales. https://t.co/fzzkAtRyLy

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 手机对当今美国青少年的影响有目共睹。现在，越来越多的州和联邦领导人开始支持学校禁止使用手机，并提出了限制使用手机的新方法。
item.description:
The hold that phones have on adolescents in America today is well-documented. Now a growing number of leaders at the state and federal levels have begun endorsing school cellphone bans and suggesting new ways to curb access to the devices. https://t.co/18JW2wBqE8 pic.twitter.com/3MfURrYNia

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 温迪公司（Wendy's）宣布将推出新的菜单价格，该价格将根据一天中的不同时段而浮动--类似于优步（Uber）和Lyft等共享出行公司采用的激增定价策略。
item.description:
Wendy’s has announced it will launch new menu prices that will fluctuate depending on the time of day — similar to surge pricing strategies adopted by rideshare companies like Uber and Lyft. https://t.co/rhoKa6KGrM pic.twitter.com/C6eX7UcBTL

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 新消息：警方周二表示，已有三人因上周在纽约地铁车厢内杀害一名男子而被捕。
item.description:
NEW: Three people have been arrested for the killing of a man on a New York City subway car last week, police said Tuesday. https://t.co/VIzMYr9Kx6

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 专家称，尽管枪击事件造成一名旁观者死亡，约二十多人受伤，但被指控在堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗集会上开枪的男子可能有充分理由通过该州的 "站在你的立场上 "法进行自卫。
item.description:
Experts say that even though the shooting left one bystander dead and roughly two dozen injured, the men accused of firing shots at the Kansas City Chiefs Super Bowl rally might have good cases for self-defense through the state’s “stand your ground” law. https://t.co/yYEHi5B9JO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description:
WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/9b0rktNlKW

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州一名 22 岁的护理专业学生在跑步时丧生，这让人们再次关注女性在户外跑步时面临的危险。
item.description:
The death of a 22-year-old nursing student in Georgia who was killed while out for a run has turned a spotlight, once again, on the dangers women face while running outdoors. https://t.co/9jivZp20hU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：1922 年，最高法院在 Leser 诉 Garnett 案中一致支持宪法第 19 修正案，该修正案保障了妇女的选举权。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: In 1922 the Supreme Court, in Leser v. Garnett, unanimously upheld the 19th Amendment to the Constitution, which guaranteed the right of women to vote. https://t.co/1Lfd5NzmKC pic.twitter.com/q8v86t58Zq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 何塞-贝兹（Jose Baez）律师在接受 ABC 新闻独家采访时说，圣约翰斯县治安官办公室对他的当事人维尔吉利奥-阿吉拉尔-门德斯（Virgilio Aguilar Mendez）实施了 "非法逮捕"，警方最初接触他的原因是种族貌相。
item.description:
Speaking exclusively with ABC News, Attorney Jose Baez said the St. Johns County Sheriff's Office conducted an "unlawful arrest" of his client, Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, and that racial profiling was the reason he was initially approached by police.https://t.co/QJPAIcIHZ5

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科一家法院周二判处一名公开反对乌克兰战争的资深人权倡导者两年零六个月监禁。他在法庭上被直接羁押。
item.description:
A Moscow court on Tuesday sentenced a veteran human rights advocate who spoke out against the war in Ukraine to two years and six months in prison. He was taken directly into custody from the courtroom. https://t.co/MW4sNYread

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一位以色列高级政治人士周二告诉美国广播公司新闻（ABC News），以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡对美国总统乔-拜登的讲话感到 "惊讶"，拜登说他希望以色列和哈马斯之间的停火协议能 "在下周一之前 "达成。
item.description:
A senior Israeli political source told ABC News on Tuesday that Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu was "surprised" by U.S. President Joe Biden's remarks that he was hopeful a cease-fire between Israel and Hamas could be in place "by next Monday." https://t.co/WHr5oo6IV2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一名男子在攀爬佛罗里达州里弗维尤的一座移动通信塔后被捕。当局称，该男子之前曾在自己的社交媒体上直播攀爬过程。
item.description:
A man was arrested after climbing a cellular tower in Riverview, Florida. Authorities said the man had previously been live-streaming the climb to his social media. pic.twitter.com/UzDPYEwiOT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 对于政治犯来说，俄罗斯刑罚殖民地和劳改营的生活是一个严峻的现实，身心压力、食物不足、医疗条件差、睡眠不足，还有无法遵守的专横规定。
item.description:
For political prisoners, life in Russia’s penal colonies and labor camps is a grim reality of physical and psychological pressure, insufficient food, poor health care, sleep deprivation and arbitrary rules that are impossible to obey. https://t.co/lWZe4oe7Lz

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 实时更新：卡塔尔外交部发言人周二表示，以色列和哈马斯之间就停火和释放人质可能达成的协议没有任何突破性进展。
item.description:
LIVE UPDATES: A spokesperson for the Qatari Ministry of Foreign Affairs said Tuesday that there is no breakthrough to announce concerning a potential deal between Israel and Hamas on a cease-fire and hostage release. https://t.co/iJmQGM3JCU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名现役空军士兵周日在华盛顿特区以色列大使馆外自焚身亡。大都会警察局已确认这名男子是来自圣安东尼奥的 25 岁亚伦-布什内尔（Aaron Bushnell）。
item.description:
An active-duty airman has died after authorities say he set himself on fire Sunday outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, D.C.

The man has been identified by the Metropolitan Police Department as 25-year-old Aaron Bushnell of San Antonio. https://t.co/ysD8m78TZs pic.twitter.com/TMR10KDWuv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 选民对乔-拜登总统对以色列-哈马斯战争的反应感到愤怒，同时也是对尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）日渐式微的共和党竞选活动的又一次考验：以下是密歇根州总统初选的看点。
item.description:
Electoral anger with President Joe Biden for his response to the Israel-Hamas war and another test of voter interest in Nikki Haley's waning GOP campaign: Here's what to watch for in Michigan's presidential primary. https://t.co/rIQQXuwj9F

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登周二将在白宫接待国会高层领导人，因为他和民主党同僚在援助乌克兰和政府拨款问题上与众议院共和党人仍有分歧，而部分停摆的最后期限还有几天就到了。
item.description:
President Joe Biden will host top congressional leaders at the White House Tuesday as he and fellow Democrats remain at odds with House Republicans over aid to Ukraine and government funding with a partial shutdown deadline just days away. https://t.co/GhNQ8H8h9k

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 1997 年在一家二手商店以几分钱买到的第一本《哈利-波特》小说的校样本在拍卖会上以 1.1 万英镑（近 1.4 万美元）的价格售出。
item.description:
A proof copy of the first "Harry Potter" novel that was bought for pennies in a second-hand store in 1997 has sold at auction for 11,000 pounds — nearly $14,000.https://t.co/VwbbxiuBWB pic.twitter.com/hiDiMZYWkZ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国国防部称，一枚二战时期的炸弹在海上被引爆，该炸弹的发现引发了英国历史上最大的一次和平时期疏散行动：
item.description:
A World War II-era bomb whose discovery prompted one of the largest peacetime evacuations in British history has been detonated at sea, the U.K. Ministry of Defense said.

Read more: https://t.co/u1lq63drUk pic.twitter.com/P9EJwjDaYT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 科学家们揭示了一个惊人的发现：一条 "非常奇特 "的 2.4 亿年前的 "中国龙 "化石。
item.description:
Scientists have revealed a remarkable discovery of a “very strange” 240 million-year-old “Chinese dragon” fossil. https://t.co/irkMfx1mSb

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 前联邦调查局线人亚历山大-斯米尔诺夫（Alexander Smirnov）被控就拜登总统及其儿子亨特-拜登（Hunter Biden）向联邦调查局撒谎，周一被还押候审。
item.description:
Alexander Smirnov, the former FBI informant charged with lying to the bureau about Pres. Biden and his son Hunter Biden, was remanded to custody Monday, pending trial. https://t.co/KknlrwkXXl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉周一表示，尼基-黑莉一直以两位数的优势输给唐纳德-特朗普，但这位前总统迄今在有争议的竞选中只获得了 60% 的选票，这一事实应被视为一个警示信号。
item.description:
Nikki Haley keeps losing to Donald Trump by double digits but the fact that the former president has only managed to reach 60% of the vote in the contested races so far should be taken as a warning sign, Haley said on Monday. https://t.co/XhwUEgcSKB

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 根据最新提交的逮捕宣誓书，在佐治亚大学校园内杀害一名护理专业学生的嫌犯在作案时使用了一件物品作为武器。
item.description:
The suspect in the killing of a nursing student on the University of Georgia campus used an object as a weapon in the crime, according to newly filed arrest affidavits. https://t.co/1dCo5nTwyG

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 比佛利山警察局表示，上周一所中学报告称，有学生涉嫌参与制作和分享使用人工智能生成的裸体图像，这些图像中出现了同学的面孔，警方正在对此展开调查。
item.description:
The Beverly Hills Police Department said it is investigating after a middle school reported last week that students were allegedly involved in creating and sharing nude images generated using AI that featured the faces of fellow students. https://t.co/OU9foFoONW

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 俄克拉荷马州奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）的学生周一因非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）之死而退学。
item.description:
Students at Owasso High School in Oklahoma walked out of school Monday over nonbinary student Nex Benedict's death. https://t.co/5QPGJShQ4S

item.title: 为什么一些长期服用 COVID 的患者会出现 "脑雾"，这一直是个医学之谜。答案也许终于有了。
item.description:
It's been a medical mystery why some long COVID patients experience "brain fog." There may finally be an answer. https://t.co/9lMLQRBY0W

item.title: 位于布朗克斯区的阿尔伯特-爱因斯坦医学院获得了一笔价值十亿美元的历史性捐赠，这为学生们今后的学习提供了免费学费。
item.description:
A historic, billion-dollar donation to the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in the Bronx has provided students with free tuition moving forward. https://t.co/NVOHASILCo

item.title: 据提交给联邦法院的法庭文件显示，联邦贸易委员会周一起诉要求停止克罗格（Kroger）和阿尔伯森（Albertsons）的合并。此次合并将代表美国最大的两家连锁杂货店强强联手。
item.description:
The Federal Trade Commission on Monday sued to halt the Kroger and Albertsons merger, according to court documents filed in federal court.

The merger would represent two of the largest grocery store chains in the United States combining forces.https://t.co/WfSiEbPCT3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的代表在一份声明中回应了该歌手的父亲斯科特-斯威夫特（Scott Swift）与一名摄影师在澳大利亚悉尼发生口角的指控。
item.description:
Taylor Swift’s rep is responding to an alleged altercation between the singer's dad, Scott Swift, and a photographer in Sydney, Australia.

"Two individuals were aggressively pushing their way towards Taylor," the singer's reps said in a statement.https://t.co/Bd2h7A8K2T pic.twitter.com/hk34iJeZlU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024
